description:
Sexy Dr. Casey Calvert hates bad cops. She is a police psychologist on a mission to keep unstable cops like Xander Corvus off the streets. When detective Corvus is held for a mandatory psych screening, he quickly turns the tables on the disapproving psychologist, and shows Dr. Calvert that even bad cops have their redeeming qualities.
Casey Calvert is unbelievably hot when Xander straps her to a table and fucks her throat till the drool covers her pretty face and glasses. Casey learns to love it when Xander strings her up in suspension bondage and whips her, making her beg for his fat cock in her tight little pussy. When Casey is tied down, legs spread wide, her asshole is the subjuct of much rough anal sex. Xander coaxes multiple rushing orgasms out of the good doctor as he fucks her uptight ass, leaving Casey begging for more.
title: The Dirty Cop
